42.description: Lisa Jay Johnson from Energies Balanced reads and discusses the 2nd Chapter in The Four Agreements Companion Book by Don Miguel Ruiz, The Power of The Word. This reading is part II of the chapter The Power of The Word.

43.title: Episode 25: The Power of Words
43.description: Lisa Jay Johnson reads and discusses the first part of Chapter 2 of The Four Agreements Companion Book by Don Miguel Ruiz.

44.title: Episode 24: The Judge & The Victim
44.description: Lisa Jay Johnson reads and discusses the second half of the chapter "Domestication" in The Four Agreements Companion Book by Author Don Miguel Ruiz.  We apologize that our recording is lower quality than normal as we had to resort to recording the conversation on a cell phone instead of our normal equipment.

45.title: Episode 23: The Book of Law
45.description: Lisa Jay Johnson reads and discusses Don Miguel Ruiz's "The 4 Agreements Companion Book". This reading gets into the section called The Book of Law inside the first chapter Domestication.  Words are powerful so be aware of your intention behind their usage.

46.title: Episode 22: Domestication
46.description: Lisa Jay Johnson reads Don Miguel Ruiz's  "The Four Agreements Companion Book" with Janet Mills. Lisa discusses the 4 agreements and reads from the first chapter of the book "Domestication".

47.title: Episode 21: Focus
47.description: Lisa Johnson from Energies Balanced reads from Fred Alan Wolf's The Eagles Quest and discusses how to focus attention on imagination and practice withdrawing from distractions to refocus our attention on enhancing our other senses.

48.title: Episode 20: Imagination
48.description: Lisa Johnson from Energies Balanced reads from The Eagle's Quest by Fred Alan Wolf and discusses how imagination is an important part of finding our other lost senses.

49.title: Episode 19: The Lost 5 Senses
49.description: Lisa Johnson from Energies Balanced reads and discusses out of The Eagles Quest by Fred Alan Wolf. The reading is on the lost 5 senses that we do not connect with now.  Imagination is one of the main keys.

50.title: Episode 18: Thought Density
50.description: Lisa Johnson from Energies Balanced reads from The Eagles Quest: A Physicist Finds the Scientific Truth at the Heart of the Shamanic World by Fred Alan Wolf. The reading discusses the nature of density in our thoughts have.

51.title: Episode 17: Intuition
51.description: Lisa Johnson from Energies Balanced reads form Cathryn Mitchon's The Eight Human Talents, and discusses intuition. There are also some practical meditations included in this recording to help you along the way.

52.title: Episode 16: Memory (Round Table Discussion)
52.description: Lisa Johnson, Barbara Doss & Todd Johnson from Energies Balanced discuss memory and other subjects related to it.

53.title: Episode 15: Death And What It Means As Spiritual Beings
53.description: Lisa Johnson from Energies Balanced reads from Ram Dass's Be Here Now, and Swami Satchidananda's  translation of  Pantanjali's Yoga Sutras. The Topic of this episode is death and what it means to us as spiritual beings leaving the physical body.

54.title: Episode 14: Social Spiritality & Our Current Dilemma
54.description: Lisa Johnson reads and discusses Ram Dass' s Be Here Now on the chapter of Family Sadnana. This relates to the current topic of gun control in America. Are guns really the problem or is the lack of spiritual growth in our individual family units? Listen and get informed to solutions that make you think deeper.

55.title: Episode 13: Sadhana II (Setting)
55.description: Lisa Johnson from EnergiesBalanced.com reads and discusses Ram Dass's Be Here Now.  The topic is about our setting and our personal responsibility while on our spiritual journey.

56.title: Episode 12: Sadhana - spiritual exertion towards an intended goal
56.description: Lisa J. from Energies Balanced reads and discusses from Ram Dass's Be Here Now. The topic is Sadhana and transcending the ego.

57.title: Episode 11: "I" Am Not My Body
57.description: Lisa J. from Energies Balanced reads from Ram Dass's book Be Here Now and discusses how we are not who we think we are. Not the body, not the mind, not the intellect...

58.title: Episode 10: Movement
58.description: Lisa J. from Energies Balanced reads from Ram Dass's Be Here Now and discusses how movement is beneficial to us not only for health of the body but for the health of the spirit as well.

59.title: Episode 9: We Can Not Escape Change
59.description: Lisa J from Energies Balanced reads form Cathryn Michon's The Eight Human Talents and discusses how we need to hold ourselves accountable for our own happiness inside and not depend on the external world to solve our problems.

60.title: Episode 8: Mind - The Builder
60.description: Lisa J. From Energies Balanced reads from Ram Dass's be here now and discusses how we can use our minds to look inside ourselves to find and listen to our intuition.

61.title: Episode 7: The Shadow Heart
61.description: Lisa J. discusses Yoga Philosophy and explores the phenomenon of worrying.

62.title: Episode 6: The Body Temple
62.description: Lisa J. reads and discusses yoga philosophy from Cathryn Michon's The 8 Human Talents.

63.title: Episode 5: That Love
63.description: Lisa J. discusses Bhakti Yoga from Ram Dass's "Be Here Now", and issues of the heart chakara from Cathryn Michon's "The 8 Human Talents".

64.title: Episode 4: Bhakti Yoga & The Heart Chakara
64.description: Lisa J. reads and discusses exerts from Ram Dass's "Be Here Now" & Cathryn Michon's "The 8 Human Talents". The main topic is feeling your heart chakara.

65.title: Episode 3: Love Over Fear
65.description: Lisa J. discusses part of the chapter on Bhakti Yoga in Ram Dass's "Be Here Now."

66.title: Episode 2: The Witness II Conclusion
66.description: Finding the observer in that space that has the purest silence in the present moment.

67.title: Episode 1: The Witness
67.description: Lisa J. from Energies Balanced reads from Ram Dass's "Be Here Now" - Pgs 67-69. Please note that this recording and the next two episodes are recorded with low quality equipment.  We are now using higher quality recording devices for our current work.  Thanks for your patience and we really appreciate your time.
